title: Experience-weighted attraction learning in network coordination games. (arXiv:2310.18835v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: This paper studies the action dynamics of network coordination games with bounded-rational agents. I apply the experience-weighted attraction (EWA) model to the analysis as the EWA model has several free parameters that can capture different aspects of agents' behavioural features. I show that the set of possible long-term action patterns can be largely different when the behavioural parameters vary, ranging from a unique possibility in which all agents favour the risk-dominant option to some set of outcomes richer than the collection of Nash equilibria. Monotonicity and non-monotonicity in the relationship between the number of possible long-term action profiles and the behavioural parameters are explored. I also study the question of influential agents in terms of whose initial predispositions are important to the actions of the whole network. translated_title: 网络协同博弈中的经验加权吸引学习
translated_abstract: 本文研究了有界理性代理人在网络协同博弈中的行为动力学。我们应用经验加权吸引(EWA)模型进行分析，该模型具有几个自由参数，可以捕捉代理人行为特征的不同方面。我们展示了行为参数不同时可能的长期行为模式集合可能会有很大不同，从所有代理人都偏爱风险占优选项的唯一可能性到比纳什均衡集合更丰富的一些结果。我们还探索了可能的长期行为模式数量与行为参数之间的单调性和非单调性关系。此外，我们还研究了在整个网络中对行为具有重要影响的代理人的问题。代理人的重要性可以通过雅可比矩阵的左特征向量来表示，前提是代理人的初始吸引力接近于...
tldr: 本文研究了网络协同博弈中有界理性代理人的行为动力学。通过应用经验加权吸引模型，我们发现行为参数的不同可以导致可能的长期行为模式集合的差异，从唯一的风险占优选项到比纳什均衡集合更丰富的结果。此外，我们还研究了对整个网络行为具有重要影响的代理人。
en_tdlr: This paper investigates the action dynamics of bounded-rational agents in network coordination games. By applying the experience-weighted attraction model, the study reveals that the set of possible long-term action patterns can vary significantly based on the behavioral parameters, ranging from a unique risk-dominant option to outcomes richer than the collection of Nash equilibria. The research also explores the role of influential agents in shaping the actions of the entire network.
